inclusion.criterion: Subjects undergoing surgery in the supine position
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who are undergoing a procedure where the surgical incision is expected to be at least 4 inches
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who are undergoing a surgical procedure below the level of their arms.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subjects who have a negative Sure-Vue pregnancy test.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who are undergoing surgery under general anesthesia.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: If the scheduled surgery involves the head, neck or arms.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have a history of chronic pain
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have cognitive disabilities secondary to medical, chemical and genetic causes.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have peripheral vascular disease of the arms.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have carpal tunnel syndrome.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have psychiatric, substance abuse and cognitive impairments
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have had a stroke which has affected function of the upper extremities
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have had a mastectomy or other type of surgery which may have affected the lymph nodes of the arms
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. He has no other medical condition.
